__e: Lionel turned me into a murderer.
Lionel said there was something out there that could control me.
So you learn that Lionel killed your parents, and what do you do?
I know all about Lionel Luthor, but we could use the money.
he was accusing me of revealing his secrets to lionel luthor, and then i tried to explain it to him, and he wouldn't listen.
I realize that Lionel Luthor is dead and buried but maybe this will help you sleep at night.
